insert into system_log (description, layer, method, LogType, request_ip, exception_code, exception_detail, params, create_by, create_date) values (#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{layer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update system_log set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, layer = #{layer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LogType = #{logtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception_code = #{exceptionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception_detail = #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select log_id, description, layer, method, LogType, request_ip, exception_code, exception_detail, params, create_by, create_date from system_log where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
